awd_titl_txt: Presidential Young Investigators Award - Studies of         Metabolism in Mammalian Cell and Tissue Cultures
awd_abstract_narration: The overall goal of this research                                               award will be to further develop an                                             interdisciplinary program in                                                    mammalian cell engineering.                                                     Specific topic areas include:                                                                                                                                     -  Mass transfer and reaction in                                                   membrane bioreactors.                                                        -  The effects of cell density                                                     and immobilization on cellular                                                  metabolism.                                                                  -  Positive and negative                                                           isolation of cell                                                               subpopulations using magnetic                                                   immunobeads.                                                                 -  Culture of tissues.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

perf_inst.perf_inst_name: Dartmouth College Thayer School of Engineering

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: REU SUPP-Res Exp for Ugrd Supp
